title: Slow Cooker Chicken Tacos Recipe
description: These slow cooker chicken tacos are incredibly easy to make with chicken breasts, taco seasoning, and broth for tender and delicious shredded chicken.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Mexican Main Dishes Tacos Chicken Slow Cooker Chicken Tacos 4.7 (178) 132 Reviews 24 Photos This slow cooker chicken tacos recipe is easy to make with just 3 ingredients for flavorful, super tender, shredded chicken. Spoon the chicken into warm tortillas for a very tasty meal any day of the week. Submitted by Ashlie Boucher Updated on January 20, 2025 Save Rate Print Share Add Photo 24 24 24 24 Prep Time: 10 mins Cook Time: 6 hrs Total Time: 6 hrs 10 mins Servings: 8 Jump to Nutrition Facts Jump to recipe This slow cooker chicken tacos recipe is the perfect set-it-and-forget-it dinner.  How to Make Chicken Tacos In the Slow Cooker You'll find a detailed ingredient list and step-by-step instructions in the recipe below, but let's go over the basics: Slow Cooker Chicken Tacos Ingredients These are the three simple ingredients you’ll need to make these slow cooker chicken tacos:  Broth: Start with a cup of chicken broth (store-bought or homemade).  Taco seasoning: Use store-bought taco seasoning or make your own at home.  Chicken: A pound of skinless, boneless chicken breasts should make eight servings.  How to Make Slow Cooker Chicken Tacos You’ll find the full, step-by-step recipe below — but here’s a brief overview of what you can expect when you make slow cooker chicken tacos: Season the chicken, place it in a slow cooker, and pour the broth over the chicken. Cook on Low for 6 to 8 hours, then shred the chicken before serving.  How to Assemble Slow Cooker Chicken Tacos Spoon into warmed corn tortillas. Garnish with shredded lettuce, chopped tomatoes, and thinly sliced red onions, if desired.  What to Serve With Slow Cooker Chicken Tacos Explore our collection of Mexican Side Dishes for delicious serving inspiration. Here are a few of the top-rated recipes you’ll find:  Mexican Rice Quick and Easy Refried Beans Mexican Corn on the Cob (Elote) How to Store Slow Cooker Chicken Tacos Store leftover chicken in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to three days. If you need to keep it longer, you can freeze the chicken for up to three months.  Allrecipes Community Tips and Praise “Very flavorful,” says sunflower5361. “I served it on romaine lettuce leaves topped with chopped onion, cilantro , chopped tomato and a dollop of Greek yogurt.” “Quick and easy recipe,” according to blueberrylemon. “I used an entire packet of taco seasoning and added a jar of salsa for some extra flavor.” "Turned out so good!" raves Ami. "The chicken shredded with ease!" Editorial contributions by Corey Williams Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 8 servings 1 cup chicken broth 3 tablespoons taco seasoning mix 1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breasts Directions Gather all ingredients. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Combine chicken broth and taco seasoning mix in a bowl. Place chicken in a slow cooker. Pour chicken broth mixture over chicken. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Cook on Low for 6 to 8 hours. Shred chicken with two forks. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Cook’s Note Serve shredded chicken in warmed corn tortillas and top with shredded lettuce, chopped tomatoes, sliced red onions, and cilantro. I Made It Print 785 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 71 Calories 1g Fat 2g Carbs 11g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 8 Calories 71 % Daily Value * Total Fat 1g 2% Saturated Fat 0g 2% Cholesterol 30mg 10% Sodium 415mg 18% Total Carbohydrate 2g 1% Total Sugars 1g Protein 11g 22% Calcium 5mg 0% Iron 0mg 2% Potassium 71mg 2% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. Add Your Photo Photos of Slow Cooker Chicken Tacos 01 of 24 Photo by  Dotdash Meredith Food Studios 02 of 24 Photo by  Lisa Scott 07/15/2020 03 of 24 Photo by  Lucretia 06/21/2020 04 of 24 Photo by  Jennifer Magi 04/18/2020 05 of 24 Photo by  Michelle Christie 04/16/2020 06 of 24 Photo by  Alexandria Atkins 01/07/2020 07 of 24 Photo by  haleyjournals 10/10/2019 08 of 24 Photo by  Casablancaise 05/06/2019 Super easy and quite delicious ! I made few changes. I used chicken tenders which needed only 4 hours on low to be fork tender. I made with Taco seasoning I, from this site which made about the 3 Tablespoons called for. I added 1 clove of garlic chopped. Also I didn't want the chicken taco filling to be too watery , so I went ahead and used only 1/2 cup of chicken broth and with the water released by the chicken, there was plenty of cooking liquid to make the chicken filling moist..( actually, it was still too watery for me, and I might just skip the broth next time). Finally I added some chopped cilantro and a squeeze of lime just before serving, in tortillas with guacamole, sour cream and shredded cheese. 09 of 24 Photo by  Bailee 10/28/2018 I followed the exact recipe and was very pleased! Such an easy recipe. Let it cook for 6 hours on low and the chicken was so tender, it was falling apart before I even shredded it. Used low carb tortillas, beans, shredded cheese, lettuce, cilantro, and Valentino hot sauce to top it off! Would make this again 10 of 24 Photo by  Adella Bisignani Garwood 10/13/2018 I doubled the recipe using 2lbs of chicken and 2 Taco Bell packets of taco seasoning and 2 c of broth. Absolutely delicious. This was easy and inexpensive; great for family dinner or large group. 1 2 3 Next You’ll Also Love Salsa Chicken Burrito Filling 907 Ratings Chicken Taco Filling 251 Ratings Slow Cooker Salsa Chicken 99 Ratings Instant Pot® Chicken Taco Bowl 3 Ratings Salsa Chicken 4,750 Ratings Shredded Chicken Tacos 9 Ratings Instant Pot Chicken Tacos 7 Ratings Super Easy Slow Cooker Chicken Enchilada Meat 84 Ratings Slow Cooker Shredded Chicken Tacos 3 Ratings Spicy Fish Tacos with Fresh Lime Sauce 68 Ratings Taco Macaroni Skillet 8 Ratings Juicy Slow Cooker Chicken Breast For Any Diet 41 Ratings Slow Cooker Mexican Chicken and Rice 45 Ratings Spicy Shredded Chicken Tinga 7 Ratings Spanish Rice Chicken I 56 Ratings Picante Chicken 124 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios;Cook on Low for 6 to 8 hours. Shred chicken with two forks. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios
